input_args.text: 'Forbidden Archeology: SUPPRESSED New Evidence , Pyramids made out of concrete ? # www.youtube.com 34 \nThe pyramids in Egypt were built in a surprising way: They used a chemical formula to prepare a concrete limestone with which shaped the million stone blocks used in its construction. They are man-made stone. So they not had to cut them in distant quarries and then bring them back without wheels and pulleys by the desert sands. Nor winched blocks weighing between 4 and 70 tons to the height of a 40-story building, then you assemble each other with such precision that does not fit the card from a deck in 5 of their faces; even impossible to achieve with current technology. Tags'
